title: sharge ICEMAG 3 MagSafe Portable Charger, Qi2 25W Magnetic Power Bank 10000mAh 35W USB-C Fast Charging, with Active Cooling& Built-in Cable, Transparent RGB Design for iPhone 17/16/15/14 Series

bsr.category: Cell Phone Portable Power Banks Special features

bullets: 【Next-Gen Qi2 25W Wireless Charging】Enjoy the freedom of Qi2 25W MagSafe fast charging with up to 25W output. Simply snap and charge — no cables, no hassle. Designed for iPhone 17/16/15/14 users who want power and convenience in one.

【35W USB-C Super Fast Charging】Power up your MacBook Air, iPad, or Android devices at full speed with a max 35W USB-C port that supports PD, QC, AFC and FCP protocols. One power bank, total compatibility — perfect for travelers and digital creators.

【Built-In Stand for Hands-Free Viewing】The upgraded integrated kickstand keeps your device steady while charging — both in portrait and landscape modes. Perfect for watching videos, FaceTime calls, or following recipes on the go. Comfort meets functionality.
【Transparent Design with Dynamic RGB Glow】A sleek see-through case and subtle RGB light combine aesthetics with innovation. This portable charger doesn’t just power your phone — it powers your style.

【With Built-in USB C Cable】Charge and Create Freely. The side-mounted USB-C cable and port make it easy to hold your phone naturally while charging. Stay connected, scroll, and shoot comfortably — ideal for on-the-go charging.
